---
title: "GRE Vocab Review"
---

<hr style="border: 2px solid black; margin: 20px 0;">

<!-- Iframe with scrolling explicitly turned off -->
<iframe
  id="vocab-app-iframe"
  src="/vocab/"
  style="width: 100%; border: none; display: block;"
  scrolling="no"
  title="GRE Vocab Application">
</iframe>

<!-- This script listens for messages and resizes the iframe -->
<script>
  window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
    if (event.data.type === 'resize' && event.data.height) {
      const iframe = document.getElementById('vocab-app-iframe');
      // Set the height directly to the content's scrollHeight
      iframe.style.height = event.data.height + 'px';
    }
  });
</script>
